question: During the reign of which of the following rulers Harihara I and Bukka Raya I were converted to Islam?
explanation: Harihara I and Bukka Raya I served as ministers in the Kampili state after the fall of Kakatiyas of Warangal. When Kampala was overrun by Muhammad bin Tughlaq for giving refuge to a Muslim rebel, the two brothers were imprisoned and converted to Islam.
